properties.title: Coastal Transects
properties.description: Parquet dataset with the coastal transects

table:columns.name: tr_name
table:columns.description: Name of the transect, unique identifier that is composed by the source coastline and the interpolated distance to the transect origin.

table:columns.name: lon
table:columns.description: Longitude of the transect starting point.

table:columns.name: lat
table:columns.description: Latitude of the transect starting point.

table:columns.name: bearing
table:columns.description: North bearing of the transect from the landward side in degrees, with north as the reference.

table:columns.name: utm_crs
table:columns.description: EPSG code representing the UTM Coordinate Reference System for the transect.

table:columns.name: coastline_name
table:columns.description: Identifier of the coastline from which the transect was derived.

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Well-Known Binary (WKB) representation of the transect as a linestring geometry.

table:columns.name: quadkey
table:columns.description: QuadKey corresponding to the transect origin location at zoom 12, following the Bing Maps Tile System for spatial indexing.

table:columns.name: isoCountryCodeAlpha2
table:columns.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for the country in which the transect is located.

table:columns.name: admin_level_1_name
table:columns.description: Name of the first-level administrative division (e.g., country) in which the transect is located.

table:columns.name: isoSubCountryCode
table:columns.description: ISO code for the sub-country or second-level administrative division in which the transect is located.

table:columns.name: admin_level_2_name
table:columns.description: Name of the second-level administrative division (e.g., state or province) in which the transect is located.

table:columns.name: bounding_quadkey
table:columns.description: QuadKey of the bounding quadtile that encapsulates the entire transect geometry, used for spatial indexing at a broader scale.

data.title: Coastal Transects
data.description: Parquet dataset with coastal transects for this region.
